thread.title: Revive a '90s Portable TV With a Raspberry Pi
thread.title_full: Revive a '90s Portable TV With a Raspberry Pi

author: Thorin Klosowski
title: Revive a '90s Portable TV With a Raspberry Pi
text:
The portable color TV is a classic ‘90s gadget, but they’re pretty pointless nowadays. Regardless, YouTuber David Watts decided to stuff a Raspberry Pi inside to bring it some new life. Advertisement 
This video above is just part one of a currently running work in progress, but it lays the foundation for the project. The general idea is pretty self-explanatory though, the Pi gets stuffed inside the case of the portable TV, then it gets wired into that goofy LCD screen. The project isn’t done yet, but you can follow along on Watts’ channel.
